languages.text: "Наместник и его сообщники {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}получили воздаяние{/d}, которого заслуживали. Мое сердце полнится радостью от свершившегося правосудия, но и скорбит о том, что Владайм не нашел в себе сил ступить на путь покаяния. С его умом и решительностью он мог бы стать славным слугой Императора, если бы направил их в нужное русло".

traits.locale_text: "Наместник и его сообщники получили воздаяние, которого заслуживали. Мое сердце полнится радостью от свершившегося правосудия, но и скорбит о том, что Владайм не нашел в себе сил ступить на путь покаяния. С его умом и решительностью он мог бы стать славным слугой Императора, если бы направил их в нужное русло".

languages.text: "The Liege and his accomplices {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}found the retribution{/d} they deserved. My heart rejoices at the thought of the justice delivered, yet it grieves me that Vladaym could not find it in himself to follow the path of repentance. With his intellect and resolve, he could have become a worthy servant of the Emperor, if only he had applied his talents."
languages.original_text: "Наместник и его сообщники {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}получили воздаяние{/d}, которого заслуживали. Мое сердце полнится радостью от свершившегося правосудия, но и скорбит о том, что Владайм не нашел в себе сил ступить на путь покаяния. С его умом и решительностью он мог бы стать славным слугой Императора, если бы направил их в нужное русло".

traits.locale_text: "The Liege and his accomplices found the retribution they deserved. My heart rejoices at the thought of the justice delivered, yet it grieves that Vladaym could not find it in himself to follow the path of repentance. With his intellect and resolve, he could have become a worthy servant of the Emperor, if only he had applied his talents aptly."

languages.text: 「リージュとその共犯者どもは、ふさわしい{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}報い{/d}を受けたのだよ。正義が果たされたのは嬉しいことだが、ヴラダイムが懺悔の道を歩めなかったのは残念だ。彼ほどの知性と決断力があれば、皇帝の価値ある下僕になりえたものを。才能を正しく使ってさえいれば」
languages.original_text: "The Liege and his accomplices {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}found the retribution{/d} they deserved. My heart rejoices at the thought of the justice delivered, yet it grieves me that Vladaym could not find it in himself to follow the path of repentance. With his intellect and resolve, he could have become a worthy servant of the Emperor, if only he had applied his talents."

traits.locale_text: 「リージュとその共犯者どもは、ふさわしい報いを受けたのだよ。正義が果たされたのは嬉しいことだが、ヴラダイムが懺悔の道を歩めなかったのは残念だ。彼ほどの知性と決断力があれば、皇帝の価値ある下僕になりえたものを。才能を正しく使ってさえいれば」

languages.text: « Le suzerain et ses complices ont {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}reçu le châtiment{/d} qu'ils méritaient. Cette justice remplit mon cœur de joie, mais je m'attriste de savoir que Vladaym n'a pas trouvé la force de suivre le chemin de la repentance. Avec son intelligence et sa détermination, il aurait pu devenir un noble serviteur de l'Empereur s'il avait mis ses talents à profit. »
languages.original_text: "The Liege and his accomplices {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}found the retribution{/d} they deserved. My heart rejoices at the thought of the justice delivered, yet it grieves me that Vladaym could not find it in himself to follow the path of repentance. With his intellect and resolve, he could have become a worthy servant of the Emperor, if only he had applied his talents."

traits.locale_text: « Le suzerain et ses complices ont reçu le châtiment qu'ils méritaient. Cette justice remplit mon cœur de joie, mais je m'attriste de savoir que Vladaym n'a pas trouvé la force de suivre le chemin de la repentance. Avec son intelligence et sa détermination, il aurait pu devenir un noble serviteur de l'Empereur s'il avait mis ses talents à profit de manière adéquate. »

languages.text: “总督和他的同伙都{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}接受了应有的惩罚{/d}。一想到正义得到了伸张，我的心就欢欣不已。然而，弗拉迪姆却未能找到悔改的道路，这让我很是痛心。凭借他的才智与决心，只要他将才能用在正道上，他本可以成为帝皇值得信赖的仆人。”
languages.original_text: "The Liege and his accomplices {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}found the retribution{/d} they deserved. My heart rejoices at the thought of the justice delivered, yet it grieves me that Vladaym could not find it in himself to follow the path of repentance. With his intellect and resolve, he could have become a worthy servant of the Emperor, if only he had applied his talents."

traits.locale_text: “总督和他的同伙都接受了应有的惩罚。一想到正义得到了伸张，我的心就欢欣不已。然而，弗拉迪姆却未能找到悔改的道路，这让我很是痛心。凭借他的才智与决心，只要将才能用在正道上，他本可以成为帝皇值得信赖的仆人。”

languages.text: "Der Lehnsherr und seine Komplizen haben die Strafe erhalten, die sie verdient hatten. Mein Herz ist erfreut, weil der Gerechtigkeit genüge getan wurde, doch es betrübt mich, dass Vladaym den Weg der Reue in sich nicht finden konnte. Bei seinem Intellekt und seiner Entschlossenheit hätte er ein würdiger Diener des Imperators werden können, wenn er nur seine Talente genutzt hätte."
languages.original_text: "The Liege and his accomplices found the retribution they deserved. My heart rejoices at the thought of the justice delivered, yet it grieves me that Vladaym could not find it in himself to follow the path of repentance. With his intellect and resolve, he could have become a worthy servant of the Emperor, if only he had applied his talents."

traits.locale_text: "Der Lehnsherr und seine Komplizen haben die Strafe erhalten, die sie verdient hatten. Mein Herz ist erfreut, weil der Gerechtigkeit genüge getan wurde, dennoch ist es traurig, dass Vladaym den Weg der Reue in sich nicht finden konnte. Bei seinem Intellekt und seiner Entschlossenheit hätte er ein würdiger Diener des Imperators werden können, wenn er nur seine Talente richtig genutzt hätte."

languages.text: «El Señor y sus cómplices {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}enfrentaron la justa consecuencia{/d} de sus acciones. Me agrada que se haya hecho justicia, pero también me entristece que Vladaym no encontrase el camino hacia el arrepentimiento. Si hubiera utilizado su inteligencia y determinación, habría sido un leal servidor del Emperador».
languages.original_text: "The Liege and his accomplices {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}found the retribution{/d} they deserved. My heart rejoices at the thought of the justice delivered, yet it grieves me that Vladaym could not find it in himself to follow the path of repentance. With his intellect and resolve, he could have become a worthy servant of the Emperor, if only he had applied his talents."

traits.locale_text: «El Señor y sus cómplices enfrentaron la justa consecuencia de sus acciones. Me agrada que se haya hecho justicia, pero también me entristece que Vladaym no encontrase el camino hacia el arrepentimiento. Si hubiera utilizado su inteligencia y determinación de manera más efectiva, habría sido un leal servidor del Emperador.

languages.text: "Emîr ve eşlikçileri, hak ettikleri {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}cezayı aldı{/d}. Adalet yerini bulduğu için sevinçli, Vladaym günahlarını affettirebileceği bir yol tutturmadığı için de hüzünlüyüm. Zekâsı ve kararlılığı ile İmparator'a layık bir hizmetkâr olabilirdi. Keşke bu meziyetlerini kullanabilseydi."
languages.original_text: "The Liege and his accomplices {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}found the retribution{/d} they deserved. My heart rejoices at the thought of the justice delivered, yet it grieves me that Vladaym could not find it in himself to follow the path of repentance. With his intellect and resolve, he could have become a worthy servant of the Emperor, if only he had applied his talents."

traits.locale_text: "Emîr ve eşlikçileri hak ettikleri cezayı aldılar. Adalet yerini bulduğu için sevinçliyim ancak Vladaym günahlarını affettirebileceği bir yol tutturmadığı için de hüzünlüyüm. Zekâsı ve kararlılığı ile İmparator'a layık bir hizmetkâr olabilirdi. Keşke bu meziyetlerini kullanabilseydi."

"Emîr ve eşlikçileri, hak ettikleri cezayı aldı. Adalet yerini bulduğu için sevinçli, Vladaym günahlarını affettirebileceği bir yol tutturmadığı için de hüzünlüyüm. Zekâsı ve kararlılığı ile İmparator'a layık bir hizmetkâr olabilirdi. Keşke bu meziyetlerini kullanabilseydi."
